entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rocky Mountain House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
